Summary: Saturn like, multi color, police sirin with nakedc eye but 45 degree away from saturn
divs: Sighting Details945: Saturn was out of view from backyard, started looking for other planets. 10:oo pm PST came across another object blinking oval red blue green white in plan view But, with Barlow lens 2x with 4mm lens celestron 130 SLT took this photo attached, saw the same THING A FEW WEEKS AGO BUT DIDN'T HAVE CAMERA SET UP out of know where it seems to speed up then vanishes. I am determined to get a better picture but with a telescope it���s trying to catch it in a pin head. I was a skeptic not anymore, unnerving to say the least. Will keep you posted.
